page.title: 03Recreation and Sport-Capel
page.content: Capel offers a wide selection of sport through the village sports club and the community council's recreation ground facilities.The sports club was founded in the autumn of 1977 and is held in the village hall.Gymnastics, trampoling,badminton and table tennis are available There are qualified coaches with volunteers to help the many youngsters who pay 11 pounds per term.The recreation ground,area 6.852 acres,provides tennis,football,cricket and bowling.It has its own cricket pavillion and youth club.A BMX track will soon be built. In the village there are various clubs for children.Old people enjoy the Garden Club or Forget-me-not Club.Information about clubs is in Capel Capers the community magazine
